mapper.select: select quiz_cfg_code, quiz_cfg_code_name from quiz_config where quiz_cfg_code_group = 'dept'
select quiz_cfg_code, quiz_cfg_code_name from quiz_config where quiz_cfg_code_group = 'grade'

select ifnull(avg(que.exam_score), 0) from quiz_user_exam que inner join employee e on que.exam_take_id = e.emp_id where que.exam_status = 'status04'
and e.emp_dept like #{dept_scType}

select ifnull(avg(que.exam_score), 0) from quiz_user_exam que inner join employee e on que.exam_take_id = e.emp_id where que.exam_status = 'status04'
and e.emp_grade like #{grade_scType}

select c.item_no, c.total_cnt, c.fail_cnt, (c.fail_cnt/c.total_cnt) as result from (SELECT a.item_no, COUNT(*) as total_cnt, SUM(CASE WHEN a.correct_yn ='N' then 1 ELSE 0 END) as fail_cnt FROM quiz_exam_detail a, quiz_user_exam b WHERE a.exam_no = b.exam_no AND b.exam_degree = #{exam_degree} GROUP BY a.item_no ) c order by result desc LIMIT 10
